scripts.start: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=7 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run artillery.yml
scripts.normal-load: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=2 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -e normal-load artillery.yml
scripts.heavy-load: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=7 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -e heavy-load artillery.yml
scripts.normal-load-fifo: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=2 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -e normal-load-fifo artillery.yml
scripts.heavy-load-fifo: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=7 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -e heavy-load-fifo artillery.yml
scripts.lambda: cross-env MULTICORE=true ARTILLERY_WORKERS=7 node -r module-alias/register ./node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -e default lambda-artillery.yml
